org.sakaiproject.citation.tool

Class CitationHelperAction.AdvancedSearchHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.citation.tool.CitationHelperAction.AdvancedSearchHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    CitationHelperAction

    protected static class CitationHelperAction.AdvancedSearchHelper
extends Object
    This class contains constants and utility methods to maintain state of the advanced search form UI and process submitted data
    Author:
    gbhatnag
